description.zh-cn: 中国共产党员。曾任青岛陆军总医院护理员、空军医学院看护中士。战后赴台参与中共中央社会部台湾工作站活动，担任交通员，后在苏艺林等案中被中华民国政府判处死刑并枪决。后被中华人民共和国追认为烈士。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China. He served as a nursing assistant at Qingdao Army General Hospital and a nursing sergeant at the Air Force Medical College. After the war, he went to Taiwan to participate in the activities of the Taiwan Workstation of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP, serving as a courier. He was later sentenced to death and executed by the Republic of China government in the Su Yilin et al. case. He was posthumously recognized as a martyr by the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 安学林的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of An Xuelin.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。安学林于1949年加入该党。
description.en: The ruling party of China. An Xuelin joined the party in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 安学林曾在此担任护理员的医院。
description.en: The hospital where An Xuelin once worked as a nursing assistant.

description.zh-cn: 安学林赴台后曾在此担任看护中士。
description.en: After arriving in Taiwan, An Xuelin served as a nursing sergeant here.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党负责情报和反间谍工作的机构，策划了在台湾的情报活动。
description.en: The intelligence and counter-espionage agency of the Communist Party of China, which planned intelligence activities in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央社会部部长，派遣特工赴台发展情报组织。
description.en: Then Minister of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP, he dispatched agents to Taiwan to develop intelligence organizations.

description.zh-cn: 中共特工，受李克农派遣赴台领导中共中央社会部台湾工作站。
description.en: A CCP agent sent by Li Kenong to lead the Taiwan Workstation of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中共特工，受李克农派遣赴台发展组织，于1950年2月被捕，导致组织暴露。
description.en: A CCP agent sent by Li Kenong to Taiwan to develop the organization. Her arrest in February 1950 led to the exposure of the network.

description.zh-cn: 中共特工，受李克农派遣赴台。后在苏艺林等案中被判处死刑，与安学林等人一同被枪决。
description.en: A CCP agent sent to Taiwan by Li Kenong. He was later sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others.

nodes.id: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站

zh-cn: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央社会部派遣人员在台湾建立的情报组织，由朱芳春（于非）领导，1950年被中华民国政府破获。
description.en: An intelligence organization established in Taiwan by personnel dispatched by the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP, led by Zhu Fangchun (Yu Fei). It was uncovered by the Republic of China government in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站成员，吸收安学林加入组织。后在苏艺林等案中被判处死刑，与安学林等人一同被枪决。
description.en: A member of the Taiwan Workstation of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP, he recruited An Xuelin into the organization. He was later sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站成员，与安学林、陈平在同一小组。后在苏艺林等案中被判处死刑，与安学林等人一同被枪决。
description.en: A member of the Taiwan Workstation of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP, he was in the same small group as An Xuelin and Chen Ping. He was later sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others.

description.zh-cn: 1949年后退守台湾的政权。其情治单位破获了中共中央社会部台湾工作站，并处决了安学林等相关人员。
description.en: The regime that retreated to Taiwan after 1949. Its intelligence agencies uncovered the Taiwan Workstation of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP and executed An Xuelin and other related personnel.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站成员，负责军事情搜。后在苏艺林等案中被判处死刑，与安学林等人一同被枪决。
description.en: A member of the Taiwan Workstation of the Central Social Affairs Department of the CCP, responsible for military intelligence gathering. He was later sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others.

location.zh-cn: 北京西山国家森林公园

description.zh-cn: 位于北京西山国家森林公园，为纪念1950年代在台湾被处决的中共“隐避战线烈士”而建，其纪念碑上刻有安学林的名字。
description.en: Located in Beijing Xishan National Forest Park, it was built to commemorate the CCP's 'hidden front martyrs' executed in Taiwan in the 1950s. An Xuelin's name is inscribed on its monument.

description.zh-cn: 1949年成立的政权，追认安学林等人为烈士。
description.en: The regime established in 1949, which posthumously recognized An Xuelin and others as martyrs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国授予为国家和人民利益牺牲者的荣誉称号。安学林被追认为烈士。
description.en: An honorary title conferred by the People's Republic of China on those who sacrificed their lives for the interests of the country and the people. An Xuelin was posthumously recognized as a martyr.

description.zh-cn: 在苏艺林等案中被判处死刑，于1951年6月29日与安学林等人一同被枪决。
description.en: Sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others on June 29, 1951.

description.zh-cn: 在苏艺林等案中被判处死刑，于1951年6月29日与安学林等人一同被枪决。
description.en: Sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others on June 29, 1951.

description.zh-cn: 在苏艺林等案中被判处死刑，于1951年6月29日与安学林等人一同被枪决。
description.en: Sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others on June 29, 1951.

description.en: Sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others on June 29, 1951.

description.en: Sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others on June 29, 1951.

description.en: Sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others on June 29, 1951.

description.en: Sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others on June 29, 1951.

description.en: Sentenced to death in the Su Yilin et al. case and executed along with An Xuelin and others on June 29, 1951.

relationships.target: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站

description.zh-cn: 吸收安学林加入中共在台组织。
description.en: Recruited An Xuelin to join the CCP organization in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 与陈顺福、余熙同属一个活动小组。
description.en: Belonged to the same activity small group with Chen Shunfu and Yu Xi.

description.zh-cn: 与余熙、陈顺福同属一个活动小组。
description.en: Belonged to the same activity small group with Yu Xi and Chen Shunfu.

description.zh-cn: 因参与中共在台情报活动，判处安学林死刑并予以枪决。
description.en: Sentenced An Xuelin to death and executed him for participating in CCP intelligence activities in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 派遣朱芳春（于非）赴台发展情报组织。
description.en: Dispatched Zhu Fangchun (Yu Fei) to Taiwan to develop an intelligence organization.

description.zh-cn: 派遣萧明华赴台发展情报组织。
description.en: Dispatched Xiao Minghua to Taiwan to develop an intelligence organization.

description.zh-cn: 派遣周一粟赴台发展情报组织。
description.en: Dispatched Zhou Yisu to Taiwan to develop an intelligence organization.

relationships.source: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站

relationships.target: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站

description.zh-cn: 在朱芳春（于非）领导下负责军事情报搜集工作。
description.en: Was responsible for military intelligence gathering under the leadership of Zhu Fangchun (Yu Fei).

description.zh-cn: 被中共国家安全部追认为中华人民共和国烈士。
description.en: Was posthumously recognized as a Martyr of the People's Republic of China by the Ministry of State Security of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 追认安学林为烈士。
description.en: Posthumously recognized An Xuelin as a martyr.

description.zh-cn: 广场上的无名英雄纪念碑上刻有安学林的名字以作纪念。
description.en: An Xuelin's name is inscribed on the Monument to the Unnamed Heroes in the plaza to commemorate him.

relationships.target: 中共中央社会部台湾工作站

description.zh-cn: 中华民国情治单位侦破该组织，逮捕了萧明华等成员，最终导致组织瓦解。
description.en: Intelligence agencies of the Republic of China uncovered the organization, arresting members like Xiao Minghua, which ultimately led to the organization's collapse.

description.zh-cn: 判处死刑并予以枪决。
